movies.title: Persona 3 the Movie: #1 Spring of Birth
movies.plot: In the spring, male student Makoto Yuki transfers to Gekkoukan High School. However, as he heads to his new dormitory, listening to the music on his headphones, he is stopped. More precisely, time has stopped, and the people who were around him turn into coffins. Makoto learns that this period of time hidden between the minute of midnight is called the Dark Hour, a time when monsters called Shadows appear. Suddenly made the leader of his fellow classmates Yukari and Junpei by his upperclassmen Mitsuru and Akihiko, Makoto must learn empathy, his connection to his comrades, and the meaning of death. With the power of his Evoker aimed at his head, Makoto fights against the Shadows threatening to attack his world from the mysterious tower of Tartarus.
movies.simplePlot: In the spring, male student Makoto Yuki transfers to Gekkoukan High School. However, as he heads to his new dormitory, listening to the music on his headphones, he is stopped. More ...

biography.bio: Akira Ishida was born on November 2, 1967 in Nisshin, Japan. He is an actor, known for Naruto: Shippûden (2007), Gintama (2006) and Mobile Suit Gundam Seed (2002).
biography.name: Akira Ishida

biography.bio: Hikaru Midorikawa was born on May 2, 1968 in Tochigi, Japan. He is an actor, known for Kill Bill: Vol. 1 (2003), Dragon Ball Z Kai (2009) and Dragon Ball Z: Battle of Gods (2013).
biography.name: Hikaru Midorikawa

biography.bio: Kazuya Nakai was born on November 25, 1967 in Kobe, Japan. He is an actor, known for Gintama (2006), Samurai Champloo (2004) and One Piece Film Z (2012).
biography.name: Kazuya Nakai

biography.bio: Mamiko Noto was born on February 6, 1980 in Kanazawa, Ishikawa, Japan. She is an actress, known for Hell Girl (2005), Tokyo Godfathers (2003) and Hell Girl: Two Mirrors (2006).
biography.name: Mamiko Noto

biography.bio: Rie Tanaka was born on January 3, 1979 in Sapporo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Mobile Suit Gundam Seed (2002), Time of Eve (2010) and Chobits (2002). She has been married to Kôichi Yamadera since June 17, 2012.
biography.name: Rie Tanaka

biography.bio: Kôsuke Toriumi was born on May 16, 1973 in Chigasaki, Kanagawa, Japan. He is an actor, known for Naruto: Shippûden (2007), Naruto (2002) and Naruto Shippûden: The Movie 3: Inheritors of the Will of Fire (2009).
biography.name: Kôsuke Toriumi

biography.bio: Megumi Toyoguchi was born on January 2, 1978 in Machida, Japan. She is an actress, known for Pokémon the Series: Diamond and Pearl (2006), Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children (2005) and .hack//SIGN (2002).
biography.name: Megumi Toyoguchi
